title: 10 MUST-KNOW TRACTOR HYDRAULIC TIPS! ONE SAVED ME $3800!

tasks.task: Operate and maintain hydraulic systems on a tractor.
subtasks: Identify and order correct-sized dust covers for hydraulic couplers.
Release hydraulic pressure before disconnecting or reconnecting couplers.
Properly disengage and reconnect Pioneer or Ag style couplers.
Assemble and disassemble flat face couplers.
Recognize and handle different hydraulic coupler styles (e.g., flat face, Pioneer).
Understand the necessity of maintaining hydraulic filters to prevent costly repairs.
Install or use hydraulic multipliers to expand the number of hydraulic functions.
Protect hydraulic hoses and cylinders from damage during storage and use.
Use release valves or similar mechanisms to relieve hydraulic pressure when disconnecting.
